Job Title: Emissions Consultant

Location: Sugar Land, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology, Sales

Description:
Job description: Reducing methane emissions from the oil and gas industry is increasingly considered the most urgent priority in the global fight against climate change . SLB End-to-end Emission Solutions (SEES) works directly with some of the world’s largest Oil and Gas customers to tackle their methane emissions. SEES is hiring an emissions consultant, who will be responsible for delivering customer methane emissions engagements that may include the oversight of field measurement teams, emissions inventory assessments, and advising clients on most appropriate and cost-effective measures to measure/reduce methane emissions and meet the customers’ methane emissions reduction targets.

Responsibilities

 Direct a team of engineers, designers, consultants, subcontrators to complete contracted projects  Research customer requirements.  Participate in engineering society task groups and sales and engineering presentations  Be accountable for supervising, training, developing, motivating and guiding subordinate personnel to achieve project objectives.  Guide efforts of drafters and technicians.  Plan, conduct and direct research and development work on complex projects, using new and unique approaches as applicable.  Monitor long- and short-term industry trends. Evaluate existing Product Lines for performance in advancing technology.  Train customers in installation, utilization and maintenance of equipment, as required.  Educate, mentor and provide technical guidance to other engineers and project leaders.  Lead projects and assume accountability for capital and expense costs, resource requirements, project scheduling and deliverables.  Represent the organization in external forums. 


Minimum Qualification & Experience

 Technical degree plus minimum of 8 years' experience or B.S Engineering degree with 6 years of experience  Relevant experience in the field of methane emission in oil and gas applications  Field experience with direct methane measurement equipment  Strong statistical analysis skills, knowledge about methane emissions, writing skills are required  Knowledge on environmental regulations and process engineering would be preferred  Strong collaboration skills to be able to work with multiple global teams are required 


About SLB:

SLB is the world’s leading supplier of innovative technology, integrated project management and information solutions to the global energy industry with leading digital solutions and ground-breaking technologies that enable performance and sustainability, and our innovations help industry-at-large to decarbonize. As a global technology company, SLB is committed in driving energy innovation and decarbonization to address the world's energy needs today and to forge the road ahead for the energy transition. SLB End-to-end Emissions Solutions (SEES) offers a one-stop shop for tailored solutions on managing methane emissions and flaring. We tackle methane and flaring challenges head-on with the tools and services needed to measure emissions, reduce methane, and achieve zero routine flaring.

More about SLB End-to-end Emissions Solutions (SEES) : https://www.slb.com/products-and-services/decarbonizing-industry/methane-emissions-management/sees-end-to-end-emissions-solutions-family

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
